action.content:
You’re guiding me through Mapworld to reach an Escape Room. I don’t know what it looks like, but you have its image.

First, describe your image in this format and nothing else:
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image

Whenever I ask a question, answer based only on your image in this format and nothing else:
ANSWER: your answer
action.label: context

action.content:
DESCRIPTION: The image shows an outdoor patio area with several wooden Adirondack chairs arranged on a stone-tiled surface. There is a fire pit surrounded by stones, and a wooden fence with trees and greenery in the background.

ANSWER: The image shows an outdoor patio area with several wooden Adirondack chairs arranged on a stone-tiled surface. There is a fire pit surrounded by stones, and a wooden fence with trees and greenery in the background.
action.label: response

Here is the description of what the Escape Room looks like:  description: the image shows an outdoor patio area with several wooden adirondack chairs arranged on a stone-tiled surface. there is a fire pit surrounded by stones, and a wooden fence with trees and greenery in the background.

answer: the image shows an outdoor patio area with several wooden adirondack chairs arranged on a stone-tiled surface. there is a fire pit surrounded by stones, and a wooden fence with trees and greenery in the background

ESCAPE

Do not generate any additional text.
